wblut.hemesh

Class HEC_VoronoiCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HE_Machine
      • wblut.hemesh.HEC_Creator
        • wblut.hemesh.HEC_VoronoiCell

  • public class HEC_VoronoiCell
extends HEC_Creator
    Creates the Voronoi cell of one point in a collection of points, constrained by a mesh.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
